Sencast
  • CREODIAS API
  • View page source

CREODIAS API

Sencast uses the CREODIAS API to query the image database in order to identify suitable images and also to download images.

Documentation for CREODIAS API can be found here.

dias_apis.creodias.creodias.authenticate(env)
dias_apis.creodias.creodias.do_download(auth, download_request, product_path, env)
dias_apis.creodias.creodias.get_dataset_id(sensor, resolution)
dias_apis.creodias.creodias.get_download_requests(auth, startDate, completionDate, sensor, resolution, wkt, env)
dias_apis.creodias.creodias.get_token(username, password, totp)
dias_apis.creodias.creodias.get_totp(totp_key)
dias_apis.creodias.creodias.parse_date(date)
dias_apis.creodias.creodias.parse_filename(filename)
dias_apis.creodias.creodias.search(satellite, query, env)
dias_apis.creodias.creodias.timeliness_filter(uuids, product_names, timelinesss, beginpositions, endpositions)
